salad.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a mixture of raw vegetables, especially lettuce,  cucumber, and tomato
salad.translation[0].definitions[0].note: toss a salad (=mix it all together, usually with a dressing)
salad.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Would you like some salad with your pasta?
salad.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: raw or cooked food cut into small pieces and served cold
